title: 3dDTtoDWI
description: Tool to compute multiple gradient images from tensors and gradient vector coordinates applied to the I0-dataset.

gradient_file.title: Gradient File
gradient_file.description: 1D file containing the gradient vectors (ASCII floats) for non-zero gradients.

dt_dataset.title: DT Dataset
dt_dataset.description: 6-sub-brick dataset containing the diffusion tensor data (Dxx, Dxy, Dyy, Dxz, Dyz, Dzz).

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for the output dataset name.

automask.title: Automask
automask.description: Compute gradient images only for high-intensity (brain) voxels.

datum_type.title: Output Data Type
datum_type.description: Type of the output dataset (float, short, or byte).
